attributes.action: Make "International Talk Like A Pirate Day" a national holiday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I assure you that this petition is completely serious. Britain was once an epicentre of pirate activity, we should embrace our swashbuckling roots as an important part of our history. We have long neglected the fact that some of our richest culture and museum springs from piracy, and it's time that the government took notice.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
